snippet: Americana Kitchen and Bar in Syosset has taken over a location once inhabited by 516 American Kitchen and Bar.
abstract: Joanne Starkey reviews Americana Kitchen and Bar in Syosset (Metropolitan/Long Island). Photos (M)
lead_paragraph: THE owners, the chef and the menu are new at the Americana Kitchen and Bar in Syosset, which opened in March, and a banner outside reads, ''Grand Opening.'' The name, though, is little changed from that of the previous restaurant at this location, which was called 516 American Kitchen and Bar. Adding to the confusion is the logo of the new place, which consists of an interstate highway sign with the numbers 516. Rick Gusmano, who owns Americana along with his wife, Gin, said on the telephone after my visits that the couple had hoped to keep and build on the following of the earlier restaurant when they selected the name for theirs.

headline.main: A Familiar Location, But New Ambitions
